sentence: CNN reports that North Carolina senator Thom Tillis is now backing Cawthorn's primary opponent, an extraordinary broadside against a fellow Republican from his home state.? Other GOP lawmakers, for whom the allegations of Republicans being drug users and orgy enthusiasts apparently went too far, are also said to be considering endorsing one of his primary foes...amid growing concerns that the North Carolina Republican is dragging down the entire party with his problematic behavior.? According to CNN, the most powerful Republicans in North Carolina's state legislature, Phil Berger and Tim Moore, are headlining a fundraiser for State Senator Chuck Edwards, Cawthorn's opponent, on Thursday.
author: Bess Levin
title: Party That Excused Rioters Smearing Human S--t on the Walls of the Capitol Draws the Line at Cocaine and Orgy Allegations
